#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long LL;
const int MAXN = 2000 + 10;

struct Line {// y = m * x + b
  LL m, b;
  Line() {}
  Line(LL x, LL y): m(x), b(y) {}
} Q[MAXN];

LL dp[MAXN], S[MAXN];
int C[MAXN], n, m;

bool check(Line &a, Line &b, LL x) {
  return x * a.m + a.b > x * b.m + b.b;
}

void run() {
  scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);
  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) scanf("%d", C + i);
  sort(C, C + n);
  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) S[i + 1] = S[i] + C[i];
  dp[0] = 0;
  for (int j = 1; j <= m; ++j) {
    int h = 0, t = 0;
    Q[t++] = Line(n - j + 1, dp[j - 1] - (n - j + 1) * S[j - 1]);
    for (int i = j; i <= n; ++i) {
      while (h + 1 < t && check(Q[h], Q[h + 1], S[i])) ++h;
      if (j > 1) Q[t++] = Line(n - i, dp[i] - S[i] * (n - i));
      dp[i] = S[i] * Q[h].m + Q[h].b;
    }
  }
  cout << dp[n] << endl;
}

int main() {
  int T; scanf("%d", &T);
  for (int cas = 1; cas <= T; ++cas) run();
  return 0;
}
